status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"esv18","text":"Collect samples in sterile 50 mL polypropylene tubes and fix with formaldehyde or glutaraldehyde (2% final concentration). Store samples at   in the dark.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":140,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"cq7pr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"6E8765B0DEEE11E8AFD89D0CFAB0504E","id":0,"label":"","step_guid":"4F5567A0DEEE11E8AFD89D0CFAB0504E","temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cgvvt","text":"Stain filters with the retained material from filtration by applying  of aqueous 0.1% Calcofluor White directly to sample and filter, making sure to cover the entire area of the filter.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":69,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"76ili","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"dpf9m","text":"Allow  to   then use vacuum to remove the excess stain from the filter. Avoid any light source.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":72,"length":23}],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":6,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":10,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"95l0i","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"cmqne","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"2ags3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"600","guid":"28F958E0DEEF11E8AFD89D0CFAB0504E","id":0,"label":"","step_guid":"7678C890DEEE11E8AFD89D0CFAB0504E","unit":1}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"3A0F4770DEEF11E8AFD89D0CFAB0504E","id":0,"label":"","step_guid":"7678C890DEEE11E8AFD89D0CFAB0504E"}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"4091D810DEEF11E8AFD89D0CFAB0504E","id":0,"label":"","step_guid":"7678C890DEEE11E8AFD89D0CFAB0504E"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"370um","text":"Filter   to   (depending on the environment) of seawater by 0.22-µm mesh black 25 mm diameter polycarbonate filters (Millipore Corp.). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":7,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":12,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"9mb5v","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"33lj7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","guid":"B93CC370DEEE11E8AFD89D0CFAB0504E","id":0,"label":"","step_guid":"82A452B0DEEE11E8AFD89D0CFAB0504E","unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"30","guid":"BFA626C0DEEE11E8AFD89D0CFAB0504E","id":0,"label":"","step_guid":"82A452B0DEEE11E8AFD89D0CFAB0504E","unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5o0fq","text":"Place the filter (sample side up) onto a slide and add 1 drop of non-fluorescent immersion oil to the top of the filter, then cover with a cover slip.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"eaens","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ar5vb","text":" Count slides immediately on epifluorescent microscope or store at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":67,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"a98kv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"94cjp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"2F3A0910DEF011E8AFD89D0CFAB0504E","id":0,"label":"","step_guid":"05BCD9A0DEF011E8AFD89D0CFAB0504E","temperature":"-20","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"84t2c","text":"Use an epifluorescence microscope equipped with UV filter (used for DAPI, eg. filter set 49 Carl Zeiss Ltd., 365 nm excitation and 445-450 nm emission band pass) to examine at 1000X the entire effective area of the filters. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dp5vn","text":"Count all hyphae identified and record their length and width. Use cylinder volume as a morphological approximation to estimate the biovolume of fungal filaments. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"6gie8","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"75snm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5q863","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"fupha","text":"Biomass can be estimated based from biomass: biovolume ratios described from fungi (Newell and Statzell-Tallman, 1982).","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
